---
title: "pivoting the dataframe"
output: html_notebook
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: inline
---
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gdxtools)
```

```{r}
dataset <- read.csv(file="curve.csv")
head(dataset)
colnames(dataset)<-c("X","n","deg0","deg4")

dataset<- dataset[,2:4] %>% pivot_longer(cols=!n)
head(dataset)

mod_lit <- data.frame(dataset[2],dataset[1],dataset[3])
head(mod_lit)
```


```{r}
write.gdx("data_mod_lithium.gdx",list(trade_poly_lit=dataset), compress=F)
```
